[Y]Coding Clubs
[W]Weekly rhythm beats marathon sessions.
[c][m.]
[W]A short weekly club sustains momentum
[W]and gives time for reflection between
[W]meetings.
[W]Role rotation helps each learner
[W]experience design, coding and testing.
[c][m.]
[G]- Set weekly goals.
[G]- Rotate roles.
[G]- Showcase progress monthly.
[m][m-]
[Y]CLUB NOTE
[C]Consistency creates confident
[C]learners.
[c][m.]
